## `r data[['title']]`  

**Author:** `r author[[1]]`

**Created:**  `r Sys.time()`

**Time Series:** `r data[['inputs']][['ratingModelIdentifier']]`

**Location:**  `r data[['inputs']][['stationID']]` - `r data[['locationDescription']]`

**Period:**  `r as.Date(data[['inputs']][['startDate']])` to `r as.Date(data[['inputs']][['endDate']])`

***
```{r,echo=FALSE}
vdiagram(data)
```
Horizontal red bars at max and min gage height for the period shown.   
Unlabeled blue points are historical measurements from the last 2 years.
```{r,echo=FALSE}
vdiagramTable(data, output)
```
